sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO qm_approval_log (id, flow_key, business_id, opinion, approval_result, file_group_id, create_user_id, create_user_name, create_time) VALUES(#id#, #flowKey#, #businessId#, #opinion#, #approvalResult#, #fileGroupId#, #createUserId#, #createUserName#, #createTime#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT id, flow_key, business_id, opinion, approval_result, file_group_id, create_user_id, create_user_name, create_time FROM qm_approval_log where business_id=#businessId# order by create_time desc
SELECT id, flow_key, business_id, opinion, approval_result, file_group_id, create_user_id, create_user_name, create_time FROM qm_approval_log where id=#id#
